semantics.label: Užduoties aprašymas
semantics.description: Vadovas, nurodantis naudotojui, kaip atsakyti į šią užduotį.

semantics.label: Tikslinė kalba
semantics.description: Choose the language of the target words.

semantics.label: Žodžiai
semantics.description: Add words by uploading a CSV-file or write them in the text field.

important.description:
• Source and target words are separated with a comma (,).
  • Alternative answers are separated with a forward slash (/).
  • You may add a textual tip, using a colon (:) in front of the tip.

fields.label: Nustatyti tinkintus atsiliepimus bet kokiam balų intervalui
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: No valid words
fields.default: Nerasta tinkamų žodžių. Patikrinkite savo žodžius ir bandykite dar kartą.

fields.label: Override for Drag the Words dopzone aria label
fields.description: @sourceWord is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective value.

fields.label: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
Textual representation of the page numbers for those using a readspeaker
Text for "Not filled out" message
fields.default: Please fill in all blanks to view solution

fields.label: Assistive technology label for input field
fields.description: Use @num and @total to replace current cloze number and total cloze number

fields.label: Assistive technology label for saying an input has a tip tied to it
Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for starting task
Numbered Drop zone label
fields.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read the index of a drop zone. Variable available: @index

fields.label: Empty Drop Zone label
fields.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read that the drop zone is empty

fields.label: Contains Drop Zone label
fields.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read that the drop zone contains a draggable

fields.label: Draggable elements label
fields.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker reads that this is a draggable element. Variable available: @index, @count

fields.label: Label for show tip button
fields.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker reads it before the tip is read out

fields.label: Confirmation dialog title that user wants to reset a droppable
Confirmation dialog description that user wants to reset a droppable
fields.default: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?

fields.label: Label used for accessibility, where the read speaker indicates that dragging is initiated
Label used for accessibility, where the read speaker indicates that dragging is canceled
Label used for accessibility, where the read speaker indicates that a text is the correct answer
Header for panel containing feedback for correct/incorrect answers
Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
Assistive technology label for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology label for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology label for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Case sensitive
fields.description: Makes sure the user input has to be exactly the same as the answer.

fields.label: Require all fields to be answered before the solution can be viewed
fields.description: This option is only valid if the answer mode is set to "Fill in".

fields.label: Accept minor spelling errors
fields.description: If activated, an answer will also count as correct with minor spelling errors (3-9 characters: 1 spelling error, more than 9 characters: 2 spelling errors). This option is only valid if the answer mode is set to "Fill in".

fields.label: Enable "Switch answer mode" button
fields.description: Allow the end user to switch between modes "Fill in" and "Drag text".

fields.label: Enable "Switch language mode" button
fields.description: Allow the end user to switch between source and target words.

fields.label: Number of words in total
fields.description: Create a randomized batch of words from all available ones.

fields.label: Number of words per page
fields.description: Defines how many words that will be visible per page. If 0 is set, all words will be shown.
